articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: 8 things that changed for the stock market overnight - Gift Nifty, US inflation to MSCI index rejig | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The Asian markets surged after a rally in US stocks, while dollar and Treasury yields declined, as lower-than-expected US inflation data raised expectations that the US Federal Reserve will not hike interest rates further.
articles.content: The Indian stock market indices, Nifty 50 and Sensex today are expected to open higher on Wednesday tracking positive global cues amid a rally in Asian and US markets. The Asian markets surged after … [+5543 chars]
